Login with Facebook Submit a wedding REAL WEDDINGS WEDDING IDEAS FILMS CERTIFIED VENDORS VENDOR GUIDE GALLERY THE MAGAZINE Welcome to Maharani Weddings At Maharani Weddings, we believe that every bride deserves the fairytale wedding of her dreams! Here at MaharaniWeddings.com you will find glittering seeds of inspiration for every aspect of your upcoming wedding. In addition to profiling some of the most spectacular Indian weddings from around the globe through interviews, pictures, and videos, we also hand-pick and share a list of the best Indian wedding vendors in our Maharani Weddings Platinum Guide. From event planners to photographer
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | s, dj's, florists, cinematographers, makeup artists, mehndi artists, you name it... you’ll find connections to every resource you could ever need for all your wedding ceremonies and celebrations. Come back for daily ideas, vendor spotlights, and real-wedding moments you’ll love. COMMENT: FAVORITE: SHARE: TWEET: PIN: Anaheim, CA Indian Wedding by White Rose Production Cinema and Photo September 26, 2025 Posted by: Shawna Comments Love stories like Dylan & Komal’s remind us why South Asian weddings will never go out of style— they’re not just events, they’re experiences. From the moment their celebration began, it felt like stepping into a dream where traditi
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | on met luxury and joy filled every corner. White Rose Production Cinema and Photo , one of our trusted MaharaniWeddings Platinum Guide members, turned their wedding into a cinematic masterpiece. Their artistry captured every moment— Komal’s shy smile, Dylan’s heartfelt vows, and those epic dance floor moves that will forever live in family lore. Watching their film feels less like viewing a wedding video and more like attending a private screening of the greatest love story ever told. The celebration unfolded at the JW Marriott Anaheim Resort , where the couple hosted their sangeet, ceremony, and reception under one glamorous roof. Guests enjoyed the ease of flowing from vibrant sangeet beats to tear-jerking vows, and finally to a reception that could rival any red-carpet afterparty. With
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | Elegant Events LLC orchestrating every detail and Bloom Box Designs filling the spaces with floral artistry, Dylan & Komal’s wedding became the kind of affair guests will be telling their grandkids about. Komal looked radiant thanks to the talents of My Bella Hair by Sonia and makeup artist Tatiana Vargas Rocha , who ensured her bridal glow was worthy of the spotlight. Priti Henna Art adorned her with intricate mehndi designs that seemed to dance right along with her. And when the music swelled, 3D Sounds and Illuminate Event Services set the stage for a celebration that was equal parts electric and elegant, with live music by Amy Serrano adding soulful magic. Rentals by Elan Event Rentals and Nuage Designs gave every detail polish and perfection, creating a stage worthy of Dylan & Komal’s
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | big-screen-worthy love story. Lin & Jirsa Photography ensured each still moment sparkled, while White Rose Production's cinematography brought the wedding to life in motion. They created a complete tapestry—frozen frames you’ll treasure forever and cinematic reels that let you relive the laughter, the tears, and the epic dance-offs over and over again. Dylan & Komal’s wedding was more than a union; it was a love letter to tradition, family, and celebration. Discover more love stories and connect with Platinum Guide members. Share your favorite moment. SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | oral & Decor: Bloom Box Designs | Hair: My Bella Hair by Sonia | Makeup: Tatiana Vargas Rocha | DJs: 3D Sounds | Lighting: Illuminate Event Services | Live Music: Amy Serrano | Mehndi Artist: Priti Henna Art | Rentals: Elan Event Rentals | Rentals: Nuage Designs White Rose Production Cinema and Photo is a member of the Platinum Guide. COMMENT: FAVORITE: SHARE: TWEET: PIN: Weddings by Palladium: Tradition Meets Seaside Luxury September 25, 2025 Posted by: Shawna Comments For couples dreaming of a wedding that’s both culturally rich and luxuriously unforgettable, Palladium Weddings delivers a perfect harmony of tradition
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | and breathtaking settings. From the turquoise waters of Cancun to the lush landscapes of Jamaica, Palladium Hotel Group has mastered the art of hosting South Asian weddings that feel grand, authentic, and seamlessly orchestrated. Imagine a seaside phera beneath a mandap framed by endless blue skies at TRS Coral Hotel or Grand Palladium Costa Mujeres Resort & Spa —a moment where tradition meets the majesty of nature. Or picture your sangeet or reception in the elegant ballrooms of Grand Palladium Lady Hamilton Resort & Spa and Grand Palladium Jamaica Resort & Spa , where glamour meets convenience and every detail is customizable. What sets Palladium Weddings apart is not only their stunning venues but also their expert planning team, who understand the multi-day rhythm of South Asian weddi
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | ngs. From decor to catering and entertainment, every element is thoughtfully curated—leaving room for your unique personal touches. And while the luxury is undeniable, so is their commitment to community and planet. With eco-conscious decor options and locally sourced menus, your wedding can be both indulgent and responsible. Why Choose Weddings by Palladium? Expert Planning: A dedicated team ensures that every detail reflects your personal style and cultural traditions. Incredible Venues: From seaside mandaps to elegant ballrooms, every space is designed for versatility and beauty. Guest-Centric Services: Luxurious accommodations and resort amenities make every wedding a vacation to remember. Commitment to Sustainability: Eco-conscious practices ensure your celebration is as responsible a
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | s it is dazzling. At Palladium Weddings , your wedding isn’t just an event. It’s a journey—an experience where tradition and luxury come together in perfect harmony. Whether it’s a beachfront vow exchange or a ballroom celebration under shimmering chandeliers, every moment is crafted to be unforgettable. So why settle for ordinary when your love story deserves extraordinary? Start your happily ever after with Palladium Weddings —where cultural heritage meets breathtaking luxury. SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | t & Spa and Grand Palladium Jamaica Resort & Spa are members of the Platinum Guide. Love what you see? Explore their portfolios. COMMENT: FAVORITE: SHARE: TWEET: PIN: Maidens, VA Sikh Wedding by Catch Motion Studios September 25, 2025 Posted by: Shawna Comments Shikha & Gaurav’s love story began in medical school, where friendship blossomed into something deeper, steadier, and beautifully inevitable. Their big day was not just a wedding—it was a lively, sensory-filled celebration, blending tradition, heartfelt details, a
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | nd the kind of “Wow” factor that makes you pause mid-scroll and think, “This is what fairytales look like.” The Estate at River Run provided a backdrop that can only be described as architectural poetry. Of course, a wedding this spectacular doesn’t simply “happen.” Behind the seamless execution was the talented team at Planned Celebrations , ensuring that the flow of traditions—from the baraat and Milni to the ribbon-cutting and Anand Karaj—was smooth, intentional, and joyful. With their expert touch, every guest felt part of the magic while the couple glided through the day with nothing but smiles. Complementing the planning was the floral brilliance of Gulmohar Weddings , who brought Punjabi and Sikh inspirations into every petal and arrangement. Their décor married vibrancy with meanin
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | g, transforming spaces into living art while still respecting the sacredness of tradition. Shikha’s bridal glow was entrusted to SKS Salon , whose artistry highlighted her natural beauty while giving her the confidence to shine from morning rituals to late-night dancing. Gaurav, meanwhile, carried himself with quiet sophistication, and together, the couple radiated the kind of energy that made guests lean in just to bask in it. The beats of Dynasty AVE set the soundtrack for the day, filling the air with energy that had everyone—from little cousins to seasoned aunties—claiming their moment on the dance floor. And to fuel that dancing? A spread by Anokha , whose flavors brought guests straight into the heart of Punjabi tradition with food that was both comforting and celebratory. Rentals by
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | Rent-E-Quip provided the elegant foundation for the celebration, but Catch Motion Studios captured the real magic . Every candid laugh, every joyful tear, and every stolen glance was frozen in time through their lens, giving Shikha & Gaurav memories to relive forever. Looking through the pictures feels like stepping into a moving story, one where love is the constant thread tying every frame together. Don’t just take our word for it—immerse yourself in the full gallery and feel the magic unfold with every photo. SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | : Catch Motion Studios COMMENT: FAVORITE: SHARE: TWEET: PIN: Philadelphia, PA Indian Wedding by Joel Zar Photography September 24, 2025 Posted by: Shawna Comments Say hello to wedding goals: Chand & Amish ’s lovely celebration on today's Platinum Guide Blog ! Login with Facebook Submit a wedding REAL WEDDINGS WEDDING IDEAS FILMS CERTIFIED VENDORS VENDOR GUIDE GALLERY THE MAGAZINE Indian Wedding Vendors The complexity of Indian wedding ceremonies and celebrations makes assembling the right combination of vendors an absolute must! You want everything to go off without a hitch on your big day so you truly need to be able to rely on the best stylists, designers, caterers, DJs, mehndi artists, photographers, bartenders, you name it. It’s no easy feat coordinating all the services, contracts, and timelines for each and every vendor, even for the savviest Maharani bride, and that’s why we are her
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/indian-wedding-vendors | e to help. Here, we are on a mission to help every bride make the fairytale wedding of her dreams come to life! Whether you are blending a fusion of cultures in an American Indian wedding or embracing a more traditional route sprinkled with myriad time-honored Indian wedding rituals, the Maharani Weddings' Platinum Guide is the premium resource for vendors in every category imaginable - from planning and design to cinematography, floral and decor, bridal fashion, hair and makeup, catering, and so much more. The top-rated vendors found in our guide are carefully selected for their experience with the many unique Indian wedding traditions and customs of South Asian culture. And unlike other wedding sites, we only feature a specially chosen group of indian wedding vendors who are pre-screened
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/indian-wedding-vendors | for their exemplary experience, service, and reputation with clients. In addition to soaking up all the glamorous and vibrant Indian wedding ideas and inspiration you can in our world-class Maharani Weddings’ Platinum Guide, you can also browse our exclusive list of vendors below. Simply filter your search by category, location, or both, and voilà! You’ll be well on your way to planning your dream wedding in no time. read more close SEARCH VENDORS US Location International Location CATEGORY Select Category Accomodations Bar Services Baraat Bridal Cleaning and Preservation Bridal Fashions Bridal Jewelry Cakes & Treats Catering Cinematography Destination Weddings DJ Draping/Styling Favors Floral & Decor Hair & Makeup Honeymoon Invitations & Wedding Stationery Lighting Live Music Live Painti

Login with Facebook Submit a wedding REAL WEDDINGS WEDDING IDEAS FILMS CERTIFIED VENDORS VENDOR GUIDE GALLERY THE MAGAZINE Certified Indian Wedding Vendors The complexity of Indian wedding ceremonies and celebrations makes assembling the right combination of vendors an absolute must! You want everything to go off without a hitch on your big day so you truly need to be able to rely on the best stylists, designers, caterers, DJs, mehndi artists, photographers, bartenders, you name it. It’s no easy feat coordinating all the services, contracts, and timelines for each and every vendor, even for the savviest Maharani bride, and that’s why
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/certified-indian-wedding-vendors | we are here to help. Here, we are on a mission to help every bride make the fairytale wedding of her dreams come to life! Whether you are blending a fusion of cultures in an American Indian wedding or embracing a more traditional route sprinkled with myriad time-honored Indian wedding rituals, the Maharani Weddings' Platinum Guide is the premium resource for vendors in every category imaginable - from planning and design to cinematography, floral and decor, bridal fashion, hair and makeup, catering, and so much more. The top-rated vendors found in our guide are carefully selected for their experience with the many unique Indian wedding traditions and customs of South Asian culture. And unlike other wedding sites, we only feature a specially chosen group of indian wedding vendors who are pr
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/certified-indian-wedding-vendors | e-screened for their exemplary experience, service, and reputation with clients. In addition to soaking up all the glamorous and vibrant Indian wedding ideas and inspiration you can in our world-class Maharani Weddings’ Platinum Guide, you can also browse our exclusive list of vendors below. Simply filter your search by category, location, or both, and voilà!
